property.name: batch support
property.description: Indicates whether the tool supports batch processing

property.name: number of tools
property.description: Number of tools that can handle (i.e. open, save and other) this format.

property.name: number of tools:open
property.description: Number of tools that can open objects of this format.

property.name: number of tools:save
property.description: Number of tools that can save objects of this format.

property.name: number of tools:others
property.description: Number of tools that can handle objects of this format, beyond open and save

property.name: format-license
property.description: General information about the format license, indicates if there are any rights restrictions. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights

property.name: format-license:open
property.description: Indicates where there are any rights restrictions. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/open

property.name: format-license: ipr protected
property.description: Indicates if there exists IPR protection of the format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/ipr_protected

property.name: format-license: proprietary
property.description: Indicates whether this is a proprietary format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/proprietary

property.name: complexity of format
property.description: Indicates the complexity of this format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/complexity/ .. comment

property.name: disclosure of format
property.description: Indicates the openness of this format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/disclosure/ .. comment

property.name: ubiquity of format
property.description: Indicates to which extent this format is used. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/ubiquity/ .. comment

property.name: stability of format
property.description: Indicates the stability of format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/stability/ .. comment

property.name: documentation quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of the format documentation. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/documentation_quality/ .. comment
